program codeforces_49_A 

   implicit none 

   character(len=1005) :: s 

   integer :: i, sLength 

   character(1) :: ch 

   sLength = 0 

   read(*,'(A)') s 

   sLength = len_trim(s) 

   ! Initialize ch to something, or assume it's not set?

   ch = ' ' 

   do i = sLength, 1, -1 if( s(i:i) .ne. ' ' .and. s(i:i) .ne. '?' ) then 

         ch = s(i:i) 

         exit 

      end if 

   end do 

   ! Now convert ch to lowercase 

   if (ichar(ch) >= ichar('A') .and. ichar(ch) <= ichar('Z') ) then 

      ch = achar(ichar(ch)+32) 

   end if 

   ! check whether it's a vowel 

   if ( ch == 'a' .or. ch == 'e' .or. ch == 'i' .or. ch == 'o' .or. ch == 'u' .or. ch == 'y' ) then 

      print *, 'YES' 

   else 

      print *, 'NO' 

   end if 

end program codeforces_49_A

program codeforces_49_A

   character(len=1005) :: s 

   integer :: i, sLength

Thus:

PROGRAM codeforces_49_A

IMPLICIT NONE

CHARACTER(LEN=1000) :: s

CHARACTER(LEN=1) :: ch

INTEGER :: sLength, i

sLength = 0

READ(*, '(A)') s

sLength = LEN_TRIM(s)

ch = ' '

DO i = sLength, 1, -1

   IF( s(i:i) .NE. ' ' .AND. s(i:i) .NE. '?' ) THEN

      ch = s(i:i)

      EXIT

   END IF

END DO

! Convert to lowercase

IF( ICHAR(ch) >= ICHAR('A') .AND. ICHAR(ch) <= ICHAR('Z') ) THEN

   ch = CHAR(ICHAR(ch) + 32)

END IF

! Check vowel

IF( ch == 'a' .OR. ch == 'e' .OR. ch == 'i' .OR. ch == 'o' .OR. ch == 'u' .OR. ch == 'y' ) THEN

   PRINT *, 'YES'

ELSE

   PRINT *, 'NO'

END IF

END PROGRAM codeforces_49_A
